## How to Create a Scatter Plot (will be the TOC menue item)

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

data <- mtcars
names(data)

# create plot
p <- ggplot(data, aes(x=disp, y=hp)) +
  geom_point()

# add a theme
p <- p + theme_minimal()

# display plot
p

```
